name: Beetdown in Tooth Town
description:
BEETDOWN IN TOOTH TOWN

__________________________________________________________

A horrid FPS made in 48 hours where you become Jeremy's shoulder Anjel to stop Jeremy from suffering the consequences of making a deal with the Jevil. Don't let the rotten beets uproot Jeremy's teeth and throw them down his throat!

WASD moves.

Clicking shoots.

Spacing jumps.

Match bullets to beet shields to break them!

If the beets get the teeth to the throat, it's all over. Your only hope is to survive until the end of the plate.

____________________________________________________________________________________________________

Made for Global Game Jam 2023
by Lance & Titus Morrison.
